safetyTips: I make sure I keep 2m apart from anyone
name: CHLOE MAY JEWELLERY
website: I hand make bespoke pieces of jewellery from my workshop in Ashford. I can help you design a piece of jewellery that is part of a love story, family history or friendship. I make engagement rings, cocktail rings, weddings rings, earrings, necklaces and other bespoke pieces.
description: I handmake bespoke pieces of jewellery from my workshop in Ashford. I can help you design a piece of jewellery that is part of a love story, family history or friendship. I make engagement rings, cocktail rings, weddings rings, earrings, necklaces and other bespoke pieces. Order via email, phone, facebook, instagram.
